overview: It is about a family of older brother Nader, who works in a clinic, but deceives his brothers and tells them that he works as a sage of eyes, Helmi who sings in weddings, Mahfouz who is still studying, and uncle who uses cannabis without paying for it. By giving the cannabis dealer an archaeological chair as a price for cannabis, they know that this chair is archaeological and they search for it in an interesting comic frame.
title: Eye Doctor
